bass_strobe_decay_rate.title: Bass Strobe Decay Rate
bass_strobe_decay_rate.description: Bass strobe decay rate. Higher -> decays faster.

strobe_decay_rate.title: Strobe Decay Rate
strobe_decay_rate.description: Percussive strobe decay rate. Higher -> decays faster.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: Cutoff for quiet sounds. Higher -> only loud sounds are detected

strobe_decay.title: Strobe Decay
strobe_decay.description: How rapidly a single strobe hit fades. Higher -> faster fade

beat_decay.title: Beat Decay
beat_decay.description: How much the strobes fade across the beat. Higher -> less bright strobes towards end of beat
